text: Maxwell Emmett Buttram (June 19, 1915 - January 8, 1994) also called Pat Buttram, was an American character actor. He was famous for playing the sidekick of Gene Autry and for the character of Mr. Haney in the television series Green Acres. He had an unusual voice that, in his own words, "never quite made it through puberty." ==Other websites== * Category:1915 births Category:1994 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Alabama
title: Pat Buttram
